mapper.insert: INSERT INTO onsale ( id, order_num, price, amount, remain, start_time, end_time, listing_status, product_id, sale_price ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{orderNum}, #{price}, #{amount}, #{remain}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{listingStatus}, #{productId}, #{salePrice} )
mapper.update: UPDATE onsale SET order_num = #{orderNum}, price = #{price}, amount = #{amount}, remain = #{remain}, start_time = #{startTime}, end_time = #{endTime}, listing_status = #{listingStatus}, product_id = #{productId}, sale_price = #{salePrice} WHERE id = #{id}
